Text:

@daldan9626  I can get you Set It Off, but what version do you prefer? Theatrical or Director's Cut? The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia has not come out on DVD yet. As for the other request. I only do movies. TV is just too much for me. Please understand.
@daldan9626 I'll upload Set It Off today. So be on the look out for it

@daldan9626 Most of my torrents will have menus and special features. I'm on hold for Haunting in Connecticut 2 at my local library.
